009
010package imagingbook.common.interpolation;
011import imagingbook.common.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
012
013/**
014 * <p>
015 * A {@link PixelInterpolator} implementing bilinear interpolation in 2D.
016 * See Sec. 22.5.2 of [1] for additional details.
017 * </p>
018 * <p>
019 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic Approach</em>,
020 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
021 * </p>
022 * 
023 * @author WB
024 *
025 */
026public class BilinearInterpolator implements PixelInterpolator {
027        
028        /**
029         * Constructor.
030         */
031        public BilinearInterpolator() {
032        }
033
034        @Override
035        public float getInterpolatedValue(ScalarAccessor ia, double x, double y) {
036                final int u = (int) Math.floor(x);
037                final int v = (int) Math.floor(y);
038                
039                final double a = x - u; // a >= 0
040                final double b = y - v; // b >= 0
041                
042                final double A = ia.getVal(u, v);
043                final double B = ia.getVal(u + 1, v);
044                final double C = ia.getVal(u, v + 1);
045                final double D = ia.getVal(u + 1, v + 1);
046                
047                final double E = A + a * (B - A);
048                final double F = C + a * (D - C);
049                final double G = E + b * (F - E);
050                
051                return (float) G;
052        }
053        
054}
